parsed_email.subject: RE: Re[2]: Vessel :- Mv. Thalassini Voy.53 // Fujairah for bunkering - CTM delivery arrangements..
parsed_email.body_text:
Message: 8059930
From: Seamaster Maritime Fujairah <agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com>
To: MV THALASSINI || ASTRA SHIPMANAGEMENT <thalassini@vessels.astraship.com>,"Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc" <ops@astraship.com>
Cc: Finance Dubai <finance.dubai@seamasteruae.com>
Date: Thu, 04/Sep/2025 13:29:23 (UTC: +03:00)
Subject: RE: Re[2]: Vessel :- Mv. Thalassini Voy.53 // Fujairah for bunkering - CTM delivery arrangements..

Good Day Captain,

 

Your below CTM denomination well noted.

 

Pls advice Subj vls ETA to Fujairah.

Please always address your message/s to our common email id: agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com which is monitored 24hrs.

Best Regards,

 

Sathya Rajendran | Manager – Operations (Fujairah & Khorfakkan)

 

Seamaster Maritime L.L.C (As Agents Only)
Inside Port of Fujairah, Road No.01, Plot No: 34

P.O.BOX No: 5045 -  Fujairah, United Arab Emirates.

Tel: +971 9 228 1117 / 228 1224 | Fax: +971 9 228 1123 / 222 8774

Email: sathya@seamasteruae.com | agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com | Mob: +971 50 454 2894

Hub Operations Email: agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com
24 X 7 Mobile Number:  +971 50 458 3046

www.seamastermaritime.com

 

All business is undertaken in accordance with our standard trading conditions - copy available upon request. Seamaster Maritime (L.L.C.) provides ship agency services as “agent only”, and acts on behalf of principals in an agent-only capacity. The principal remains fully liable for the acts undertaken by Seamaster Maritime (L.L.C.) during the course of the agency work.

   

From: MV THALASSINI || ASTRA SHIPMANAGEMENT <thalassini@vessels.astraship.com>
Sent: Thursday, 4 September 2025 2:23 PM
To: Seamaster Maritime Fujairah <agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com>; Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>
Cc: Finance Dubai <finance.dubai@seamasteruae.com>
Subject: Re[2]: Vessel :- Mv. Thalassini Voy.53 // Fujairah for bunkering - CTM delivery arrangements..

 

Dear sir,

 

Good day!

 

CTM denomination:

 

100$ - 350 banknotes (35000 USD);

50$ - 50 banknotes (2500 USD);

20$ - 50 banknotes (1000 USD);

10$ - 100 banknotes (1000 USD);

5$ - 70 banknotes ( 350 USD);

1$ - 150 banknotes (150 USD)

 

Please provide us with NEW banknotes, without any SIGN and STAMP on banknotes.

 

 

 

 

Thank you and Best Regards,

 

Capt. Pavel Morozov

M.V. Thalassini

Inmst-C: 422960910 / 422960911

Tel: +870771300910

Tel: +870773910831

E Mail: thalassini@vessels.astraship.com

------------------------------------------------

Prioritizing the wellbeing of our planet and its people.

 

This email may contain confidential and privileged information. Use or disclosure of it by anyone other than an intended recipient is prohibited.
If you received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately by return email and destroy all copies of this email.

 

*Please consider the environment before printing*

-------------------------------------------------

 

 

------ Original Message ------

From "Seamaster Maritime Fujairah" <agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com>

To "Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc" <ops@astraship.com>

Cc "Finance Dubai" <finance.dubai@seamasteruae.com>; "thalassini@vessels.astraship.com" <thalassini@vessels.astraship.com>

Date 9/4/2025 10:52:13 AM

Subject RE: Vessel :- Mv. Thalassini Voy.53 // Fujairah for bunkering - CTM delivery arrangements..

 

Dear Dimitra Ioannidou,
 
Good Day!

With reference to the below message, thanks for the CTM related remittance arrangements confirmation. we will wait for the remittance details with bank swift copy accordingly.

 

Dear Master – RIC – please advise us the required CTM denomination details for the necessary arrangements – thanks..

 

We assure you our best services and attention all the time..

Santhosh Shetty | Operations Department

 

Seamaster Maritime L.L.C (Fuj Br) (As Agents Only)
Inside Port of Fujairah, Road No.01, Plot No: 34

P.O.BOX No: 5045 - Fujairah, United Arab Emirates.

Tel: +971 9 228 1117 / 228 1224 | Fax: +971 9 228 1123 / 222 8774

Email: agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com | Mob: +971 50 552 1846

 

Hub Operations Email: agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com
24 X 7 Mobile Number:  +971 50 458 3046

www.seamastermaritime.com

 

All business is undertaken in accordance with our standard trading conditions - copy available upon request. Seamaster Maritime (L.L.C.) provides ship agency services as “agent only”, and acts on behalf of principals in an agent-only capacity. The principal remains fully liable for the acts undertaken by Seamaster Maritime (L.L.C.) during the course of the agency work.

 

From: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 4, 2025 11:26 AM
To: Seamaster Maritime Fujairah <agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com>
Cc: Finance Dubai <finance.dubai@seamasteruae.com>; thalassini@vessels.astraship.com
Subject: Vessel :- Mv. Thalassini Voy.53 // Fujairah for bunkering - CTM delivery arrangements..

 

Message Number: 729811

From: ops@astraship.com

To: SEAMASTER FUJAIRAH (agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com)

Cc: finance.dubai@seamasteruae.com, THALASSINI (thalassini@vessels.astraship.com)

Sent: Thursday, Sep 4, 2025 10:26 (UTC +03:00)

Subject: Vessel :- Mv. Thalassini Voy.53 // Fujairah for bunkering - CTM delivery arrangements..

 

Dear Santhosh, 

 

Good Day.

 

Thank you for yours below which was well received and noted.

Please note that Owners will proceed with the remittance of USD 40,550.00 for the delivery of USD 40,000.00 as CTM in due course.

 

In the meantime, kindly liaise directly with the Master of our vessel, who is RIC, for the required denominations.

 

Many Thanks / Best Regards,
Dimitra Ioannidou
Operations Dept.

Astra Shipmanagement Inc
(as agents only)
6 Vouliagmenis Avenue & 12 Nirvana St.
Voula, 166 73
Athens - Greece
Tel: +30 213 0175 106

_________________Original Message_________________

Message: 8047510

From: SEAMASTER FUJAIRAH <Seamaster Maritime Fujairah <agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com>>

Subject: Vessel :- Mv. Thalassini Voy.53 // Fujairah for bunkering - CTM delivery arrangements..

Date: September 1st 2025, 14:35:45

To: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>

Cc: Finance Dubai <finance.dubai@seamasteruae.com>

 

 

Dear Dimitra Ioannidou,
 
Good Day!

Thank you for your message. Noted CTM of USD 40,000.00 for your good vessel. Please note our bank handling charges are 1.25% of CTM amount plus USD 50/- for delivery charges, hence we request you to kindly arrange remittance for the amount of USD 40,550.00 to our Bank account for CTM remittance as follows under advice to us:-
 
Our Banking details –
Bank name :                      Emirates NBD PJSC

P.O. BOX. 777, GROUP HEAD OFFICE BRANCH,

BANIYAS STREET, DEIRA, DUBAI, U.A.E
Swift Code:                       EBILAEAD
Beneficiary Name:           Seamaster Maritime LLC
Beneficiary Address:       PO Box 53498, Office 201/202, Block A,
                            Al Hudaiba Awards Building, 2nd December Interchange, Jumeirah Road, Al Mina, DUBAI, UAE
Iban no (USD)      :           AE60 0260 0005 1414 1535 103
Purpose Code     :            STS
Corresponding Bank:    Standard Chartered Bank, New York, Swift Code: SCBLUS33,
Account No :                      3582 091829 001
ABA No :                              026002561
Please advise your bankers that all banks charges are to your account for this remittance.
 
Please be advised that we require CTM to be credited to our account at least 2 working days prior to the vessel arrival, enable us to arrange the same with our bankers. Please note that Saturdays & Sundays are weekends here and request you to please avoid value date transfers falling on these days. We kindly request to arrange remittance and send us the swift copy message (MT 103) to enable us to track the funds in our bank account.
  
We kindly request you to confirm remittance and its value date and send us the swift copy (MT 103) message to enable us to track the funds with our bankers.
Please be advised also that IBAN number is compulsory for all incoming funds to UAE and hence we kindly request you to mention IBAN Number while arranging remittance.
 
Note: Any remittance / funds which are being sent to SEAMASTER MARITIME LLC, must ONLY be sent to the Bank Account which is indicated in our request for CTM/PDA/FDA as above. Prior to sending to any other bank account same will have to be checked with the Finance Manager or General Manager of Seamaster Maritime..  

We assure you our best services and attention all the time..

Santhosh Shetty | Operations Department

 

Seamaster Maritime L.L.C (Fuj Br) (As Agents Only)
Inside Port of Fujairah, Road No.01, Plot No: 34

P.O.BOX No: 5045 - Fujairah, United Arab Emirates.

Tel: +971 9 228 1117 / 228 1224 | Fax: +971 9 228 1123 / 222 8774

Email: agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com | Mob: +971 50 552 1846

 

Hub Operations Email: agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com
24 X 7 Mobile Number:  +971 50 458 3046

www.seamastermaritime.com

 

All business is undertaken in accordance with our standard trading conditions - copy available upon request. Seamaster Maritime (L.L.C.) provides ship agency services as “agent only”, and acts on behalf of principals in an agent-only capacity. The principal remains fully liable for the acts undertaken by Seamaster Maritime (L.L.C.) during the course of the agency work.

 

From: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>
Sent: Monday, September 1, 2025 1:05 PM
To: Seamaster Maritime Fujairah <agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com>
Subject: Thalassini Voy.53 // Fujairah for bunkering

 

Message Number: 728686

From: ops@astraship.com

To: SEAMASTER FUJAIRAH (agency.fujairah@seamasteruae.com)

Sent: Monday, Sep 1, 2025 12:05 (UTC +03:00)

Subject: Thalassini Voy.53 // Fujairah for bunkering

 

Dear Santhosh, 

 

Good Day.

 

Please be informed that our good vessel MV THALASSINI will be calling Fujairah for bunkering on abt 17th of September.

Kindly note that Owners intend to arrange the delivery of USD 40,000.00 as CTM for which please revert with availability and related expenses.

 

Many Thanks / Best Regards,
Dimitra Ioannidou
Operations Dept.

Astra Shipmanagement Inc
(as agents only)
6 Vouliagmenis Avenue & 12 Nirvana St.
Voula, 166 73
Athens - Greece
Tel: +30 213 0175 106

 

 

Prioritizing the wellbeing of our planet and its people.

classification.summary: Arrangements for Cash to Master (CTM) delivery for Mv. Thalassini in Fujairah are being confirmed.
